title: Programming Practical Skill Enhancement: Pedagogical Scaffolding Strategies for Technology Integration in Geography Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core geography curriculum knowledge and basic digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more instructional design plans using digital tools suitable for geography education (map-making software, GIS, etc.).
Learners can explain the process of developing technology-integrated instructional materials step-by-step according to the principles of pedagogical scaffolding.
Learners can implement a technology-integrated instructional model aimed at enhancing students' geographical inquiry skills through project-based learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
